title: Immersive Medical Ethics Leadership Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered program for strengthening ethical decision-making competencies for managers in medical device manufacturing companies

learning_goals: Analyze and propose solutions for at least three ethical dilemmas in immersive simulations based on real medical scenarios
Application of the four ethical principles (autonomy, beneficence, non-maleficence, justice) in virtual patient consultation environments using VR/AR technology

Learners Complete Three Peer Evaluations (Using Evaluation Criteria) and Two Self-Reflection Journals (Applying an Ethical Decision-Making Framework) on a Blended Learning Platform Within Deadlines, Meeting an 80% Completion Standard
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
